text: John Henry Scott (4 February 1897 – 1970) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:1970 deaths Category:People from Langley Park, County Durham Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Wolverhampton Wanderers F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Swansea City A.F.C. players Category:Watford F.C. players Category:Nuneaton Borough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Harry Scott (footballer, born 1897)
